project_info.title: Sui vs Aptos Investment Analysis
project_info.subtitle: Market Inefficiency: APT Trading at 712% Discount

key_findings: APT creates 10x more TVL per token than SUI
SUI trades at 712% premium to APT on TVL basis
APT has 2x total TVL but 1/4 market cap of SUI
SUI has 65% token supply locked vs APT 41%
APT scored higher on ecosystem fundamentals (70.5 vs 56.6)

investment_thesis.rationale: Massive valuation inefficiency with APT fundamentally superior
